bilingual.target: 安全中心定期更新安全协议。

bilingual.source: The security team worked hard to preempt any security breaches.
bilingual.target: 安全团队努力预先阻止任何安全漏洞。

bilingual.source: The MSS is responsible for national security affairs.
bilingual.target: 安全部负责国家的安全事务。

bilingual.source: The security bureau has issued new safety guidelines.
bilingual.target: 安全局发布了新的安全指南。

bilingual.source: Installing a security system makes your home safer.
bilingual.target: 安装安全系统使你的家更安全。
安全是我们最关心的问题。

bilingual.source: The increased security measures have made the airport safer.
bilingual.target: 增加的安全措施使机场更安全了。

bilingual.source: The security bureau is responsible for protecting the nation's safety.
bilingual.target: 安全局负责保护国家的安全。

bilingual.source: The bank upgraded its hsm to enhance security measures.
bilingual.target: 银行升级了其硬件安全模块以增强安全措施。

list.abstract: 网络安全技术及其协议，包括了网络通信安全、信息在网络传输中的保密性和完整性、控制访问受限网域与敏感信息以及在公共网络如因特网上使用隐秘通讯。为了解决这些问题，各大组织及技术供应商纷纷推出了各种网络和信息安全技术。
security是一个英语单词，可以用作名词和形容词，可以翻译为安全、保证，等等。

yingyinNormal.en: Homeland Security? No, no, no, ma'am, planetary security.
yingyinNormal.zh: 国土安全局？不不不，夫人，是地球安全局。

yingyinNormal.en: What does a rock have to do with Homeland Security?
yingyinNormal.zh: 一块石头和国土安全局有什么关系？

yingyinNormal.en: Taken a week ago. Diplomatic Security Service. Hobbs.
yingyinNormal.zh: 一周前拍的外交安全局是霍布斯。

yingyinNormal.en: This panel recognizes the IMF's contribution to global security.
yingyinNormal.zh: 陪审团认可碟中谍小组对于国际安全的贡献。

yingyinNormal.en: Security. We have concerns. Conway has people on House Intelligence.
yingyinNormal.zh: 安全问题，我们有些担忧。康威在众议院情报委员会里有人。

yingyinNormal.en: Howard. The person at fault for you not getting a security clearance is me.
yingyinNormal.zh: 霍华德，害你没通过安全审核的人是我。

yingyinNormal.en: Sue them. Sue who? The National Security Agency. Sue them for what?
yingyinNormal.zh: 起诉他们。起诉谁？国家安全局。起诉他们什么？

yingyinNormal.en: I'd like to aim for the chair of Armed Services or Homeland Security.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我想做众议院军事委员会主席，或者国土安全委员会主席。

yingyinNormal.en: What about installing the security profile? Well. That's gonna be like a minute tops.
yingyinNormal.zh: 替换安全资料的时间呢？这个用最多一分钟。

yingyinNormal.en: My memory has been wiped to protect... The security of the mission. Yes.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我的记忆已经被清除了，以保... 任务的安全。没错。

yingyinNormal.en: So, appreciating the government's legitimate national security concerns, I'm gonna find that the NSA's gag order should remain in place.
yingyinNormal.zh: 所以，鉴于政府合法的出于国家安全的顾虑，我决定，维持国家安全局的言论禁止令。

yingyinNormal.en: Times like this, security is more important than liberty. There is a war coming John.
yingyinNormal.zh: 在这种时刻，安全比自由更重要。要开战了，约翰。

yingyinNormal.en: A marine we can use. I'm assigning him to your team as security escort.
yingyinNormal.zh: 而是我们用得上的海军陆战队士兵，我派他去你们那里做安全护卫。

yingyinNormal.en: Ladies and gentlemen, it's time for the security services of the world to unite.
yingyinNormal.zh: 女士们，先生们，到了全世界安全机构联合起来的时候了。

yingyinNormal.en: You work with the CIA and DOD to figure out any logistics and security you have to.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你跟中情局和国防部合作解决一切必要后勤和安全问题。

yingyinNormal.en: I don't use national security matters for political purposes. You know that, Adam.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我不会把国家安全与政治竞争混为一谈，你知道的，亚当。

yingyinNormal.en: Not remotely.007, I'd like you to meet Max Denbigh, head of the Joint Security Service.
yingyinNormal.zh: 没有，007，这位是麦克斯·邓比联合安全部主管。

yingyinNormal.en: And I've got two weapons briefs under security review by the DOD. Derivative drivel.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我有两篇武器论文已经经过国防部的安全审查。毫无创意的废物。

yingyinNormal.en: They can't be doing that. They did. They lowered my security status to a red badge.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他们不能这么做。但他们确实做了，他们把我的安全级别降到红色。

yingyinNormal.en: Samaritan has preempted multiple threats to national security. You're welcome, Senator.
yingyinNormal.zh: 撒马利亚人预先解除了多起对国家安全的威胁。不用谢，参议员。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 安全；无威胁状态；抵押品；有价证券；安全感；安全措施；防护程序；保安

word_family.mean: adj. 牢固的；结实的；安全的；放心的；无威胁的；无危险的；防范严密的；逃不了的；不担惊受怕的；有把握的

sense_info_list.en: the state of being free from danger or threat

examination_example.sentence: Americans are willing to tolerate time-consuming <highlight>security</highlight> procedures in return for increased safety.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 美国人愿意忍受耗时的安全程序，以换取更高的安全性。

examination_example.sentence: Phones become our <highlight>security</highlight> blanket.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 手机成了我们的安全毯。

examination_example.sentence: Electronic means of payment may raise <highlight>security</highlight> and privacy concerns.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 电子支付方式可能会引起安全和隐私问题。

sense_info_list.en: protection against something bad that might happen in the future

examination_example.sentence: Job <highlight>security</highlight> or stability was the second most important career goal.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 工作保障或稳定是第二重要的职业目标。

examination_example.sentence: The job <highlight>security</highlight> that the US economy once offered to high school graduates has largely evaporated.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 美国经济曾经为高中毕业生提供的工作保障已经基本消失。

sense_info_list.en: procedures followed or measures taken to ensure the safety of a state or organization

examination_example.sentence: It is not yet clear how much more effective airline <highlight>security</highlight> has become — but the lines are obvious.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 目前还不清楚航空公司的安全措施变得有多有效——但界限很明显。

sense_info_list.en: the group of people responsible for protecting a building

examination_example.sentence: You meet new people every day: the grocery worker, the cab driver, new people at work or the <highlight>security</highlight> guard at the door.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你每天都会遇到新的人:杂货店工人、出租车司机、工作中的新人或门口的保安。

sense_info_list.en: a certificate attesting credit, the ownership of stocks or bonds, or the right to ownership connected with tradable derivatives

examination_example.sentence: Daniel Gallagher is the Commissioner of the US <highlight>Securities</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 丹尼尔·加拉格尔是美国证券事务专员。

sense_info_list.en: a thing deposited or pledged as a guarantee of the fulfillment of an undertaking or the repayment of a loan

exam_freq_info.chinese: 保卫部门; 保安部门

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adv. 安全地；牢固地；有把握地；安心地
n. 安全；无威胁状态；抵押品；有价证券；安全感；安全措施；防护程序；保安
n. 不安全；局促不安；无把握；不牢靠
adj. 没有信心的；不自信的；心神不定的；不牢固的；不固定的；不安全的；不稳定的；易坍塌的；可被闯入的

word_family.mean: adj. 牢固的；结实的；安全的；放心的；无威胁的；无危险的；防范严密的；逃不了的；不担惊受怕的；有把握的

sense_info_list.en: the state of being free from danger or threat

examination_example.sentence: People's economic <highlight>security</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 人民的经济安全。

examination_example.sentence: We have to respect the <highlight>security</highlight> and the integrity of rights holders.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们必须尊重版权所有者的安全和完整性。

examination_example.sentence: Nigeria's minister of agriculture, has warned that the pest may "create serious problems for food <highlight>security</highlight>" in the country.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 尼日利亚(Nigeria)农业部长发出警告称，这种害虫可能会“给该国的粮食安全造成严重问题”。

sense_info_list.en: procedures followed or measures taken to ensure the safety of a state or organization

examination_example.sentence: Police and fire services will spend the next 48 hours assessing the "<highlight>security</highlight> and safety" of the 850-year-old structure.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 警察和消防部门将在接下来的48小时内评估这座有850年历史的建筑的“安保和安全”。

sense_info_list.en: the department of a large company or organization that deals with the protection of its buildings, equipment and staff
sense_info_list.zh: 保卫部门; 保安部门

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 工作保障；工作安全；就业安全

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adv. 安全地；牢固地；有把握地；安心地
n. 安全；无威胁状态；抵押品；有价证券；安全感；安全措施；防护程序；保安
adv. 不安全地; 不可靠地
n. 不安全；局促不安；无把握；不牢靠
adj. 没有信心的；不自信的；心神不定的；不牢固的；不固定的；不安全的；不稳定的；易坍塌的；可被闯入的

word_family.mean: adj. 牢固的；结实的；安全的；放心的；无威胁的；无危险的；防范严密的；逃不了的；不担惊受怕的；有把握的

sense_info_list.en: the state of being free from danger or threat

examination_example.sentence: "It's certainly new territory, especially as home <highlight>security</highlight> cameras become easier to install, " says Lizzie Post, president of the Emily Post Institute, America's foremost manners advisers.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 美国最杰出的礼仪顾问 Emily Post Institute 的主席 Lizzie Post 说：“这肯定是一个新的领域，尤其是在家庭安全摄像头变得更容易安装的情况下。”

examination_example.sentence: I think it will be very interesting to see what etiquette (礼仪) emerges, if it's not a <highlight>security</highlight> issue.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我认为，如果不涉及安全问题，该展示怎样的礼仪会将非常有趣。

examination_example.sentence: The elephant in your living room is your Internet-connected <highlight>security</highlight> camera, a device people are increasingly using for peace of mind in their homes.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 客厅里的大象是连接互联网的安全摄像头，人们越来越多地使用这种设备来安心居家。

examination_example.sentence: When it comes to <highlight>security</highlight> cameras, Post says it's a host's responsibility to make sure guests feel comfortable within their home.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当谈论到监控摄像头时，Post 说，确保客人在家中感到舒适是主人的责任。

examination_example.sentence: They want jobs that provide <highlight>security</highlight> and flexibility, and they place relatively little importance on high pay.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 她们关心的是这份工作能否给她们以安全感、是否具有灵活性，对高薪资的重视程度相对较低。

sense_info_list.en: procedures followed or measures taken to ensure the safety of a state or organization
the group of people responsible for protecting a building

examination_example.sentence: A <highlight>security</highlight> worker had guarded the store each night from 7 p.m.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 从晚上 7 点开始，每天晚上都有一名保安人员守卫着这家商店。

examination_example.sentence: Staff at a suburban supermarket in Melbourne say they feel unsafe at work after <highlight>security</highlight> guards were removed.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 墨尔本郊区一家超市的工作人员说，保安被带走后，他们觉得工作不安全。

examination_example.sentence: To call for a permanent <highlight>security</highlight> guard.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 要找一个永久的保安。

sense_info_list.en: a thing deposited or pledged as a guarantee of the fulfillment of an undertaking or the repayment of a loan

examination_example.sentence: People from different races, genders, and regions all suffer from a lack of financial <highlight>security</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 来自不同种族、性别和地区的人都缺乏经济保障。

affix_sense_info.affix_sense_chinese: 名词后缀, 表示"…状态, 性质"

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 安全；无威胁状态；抵押品；有价证券；安全感；安全措施；防护程序；保安
n. 不安全；局促不安；无把握；不牢靠
adj. 没有信心的；不自信的；心神不定的；不牢固的；不固定的；不安全的；不稳定的；易坍塌的；可被闯入的

word_family.mean: adj. 牢固的；结实的；安全的；放心的；无威胁的；无危险的；防范严密的；逃不了的；不担惊受怕的；有把握的

sense_info_list.en: procedures followed or measures taken to ensure the safety of a state or organization

examination_example.sentence: You'll often get to stay in a central location (位置) with <highlight>security</highlight> and comfort.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 您通常可以安全舒适地呆在中心位置。

examination_example.sentence: Of those Australians who still have a landline, a third concede that they're keeping it as a <highlight>security</highlight> blanket.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在那些仍然有固定电话的澳大利亚人中，三分之一的人承认这其实不是必要的，他们把它作为一种安全保障。

examination_example.sentence: The keyboard could offer a strong layer of <highlight>security</highlight> by analyzing things like the force of a user's typing.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 通过分析用户打字的力度，键盘可以提供一层强大的保护层。
